title: Best ever banana bread loaf cake
ingredients: ['60g butter or soft spread', '150g equivalent sugar substitute (e.g. stevia)', '2 large bananas', '2 eggs', '4 tablespoons natural yoghurt', '3 tablespoons apple puree', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g wholemeal flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '100g dark chocolate chips']
